response.overview: “Pushing Ahead: The Next Generation” tells the story of “Push Ahead”, a non profit organization run by Homebase Skateshop. Push Ahead uses skateboarding to teach children core life skills like perseverance, respect, confidence, and setting goals. Push Ahead also helps create connections between people who otherwise may never have interacted with each other. “Pushing Ahead: The Next generation” is a film centered around the importance of creating community.
response.title: Pushing Ahead: The Next Generation
